name: Militarist Expansionist
description: Aggressive expansionism focused on military strength and territorial dominance

tutorialAdvice.body: Before you begin: Go to Race Info screen and set training level to 5. Elite officers will lead our conquest.

idle-labs.message: Commander! {{idleLabs}} research labs sit idle while our empire stagnates! Assign every lab to TN tech research immediately - this unlocks the path for territorial expansion. Our destiny demands we reach beyond our current borders!
{{idleLabs}} research labs are idle. Assign research projects immediately - superior technology ensures military dominance. Every advancement strengthens our conquest!

idle-construction-factories.message: {{percentageIdle}}% construction capacity sits unused while we prepare for expansion! Assign construction projects immediately - our growing empire requires infrastructure. Build the foundation for conquest!
{{percentageIdle}}% construction capacity is idle during active warfare! Assign projects immediately - our fleets require constant reinforcement. Victory demands maximum production!
{{percentageIdle}}% construction capacity is idle with rivals present. Assign projects to expand our military and industrial might. They control systems that should be ours!
{{percentageIdle}}% construction capacity is idle. Assign construction projects - our empire must grow stronger!

new-alien-contact.message: New species detected in {{systemName}}. Assess their military capabilities and territorial holdings immediately. Every system they control is one we could claim for our empire!
